Package angryflappybird

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
angryflappybird.Sprite
public class Sprite extends Object
Creates components of the game with image, position, velocity, and information about them
Author:
Willow Kelleigh and Anh Thach

  • Constructor Details

    • Sprite

      public Sprite()
      Sprite constructor with no arguments. Creates sprite with no image, position at origin, and no velocity

    • Sprite

      public Sprite(double pX, double pY, javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Sprite constructor with arguments. Creates sprite with image and position given, and no velocity
      Parameters:
      pX - X-axis position
      pY - Y-axis position
      image - Image of sprite

  • Method Details

    • setImage

      public void setImage(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Method to set image of a sprite using the image given. Image must have width and height
      Parameters:
      image - Image to be set

    • setPositionXY

      public void setPositionXY(double positionX, double positionY)
      Method to set the position of a Sprite
      Parameters:
      positionX - X-axis position
      positionY - Y-axis position

    • getPositionX

      public double getPositionX()
      Method to get the X-axis position of a Sprite
      Returns:
      X-axis position of a Sprite

    • getPositionY

      public double getPositionY()
      Method to get the Y-axis position of a Sprite
      Returns:
      Y-axis position of a Sprite

    • setVelocity

      public void setVelocity(double velocityX, double velocityY)
      Method to set the velocity of a Sprite
      Parameters:
      velocityX - the X-axis velocity
      velocityY - the Y-axis velocity

    • addVelocity

      public void addVelocity(double x, double y)
      Method to increase the velocity of a Sprite
      Parameters:
      x - amount to increase the X-axis velocity by
      y - amount to increase the Y-axis velocity by

    • getVelocityX

      public double getVelocityX()
      Method to get the X velocity of a Sprite
      Returns:
      the X velocity of a Sprite

    • getVelocityY

      public double getVelocityY()
      Method to get the Y velocity of a Sprite
      Returns:
      Y velocity of a Sprite

    • getWidth

      public double getWidth()
      Method to get the width of a sprite
      Returns:
      width of a sprite

    • render

      public void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Renders a sprite at its coordinates with its image
      Parameters:
      gc - the sprite to be rendered

    • getBoundary

      public javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D getBoundary()
      Method to get the boundary of a Sprite
      Returns:
      a rectangle of the sprite's location based on its position and size

    • intersectsSprite

      public boolean intersectsSprite(Sprite s)
      Method to see if a given sprite insetsects with another one
      Parameters:
      s - the Sprite seen if it intersected with
      Returns:
      true if they intersect, false otherwise

    • update

      public void update(double time)
      Method to update the position of the sprite vased on time elapsed and velocity of the sprite
      Parameters:
      time - Time elapsed

    • isPassed

      public boolean isPassed()
      Method to see if the sprite has passed the pipe
      Returns:
      true if if the sprite has passed the pipe, false otherwise

    • setPassed

      public void setPassed(Sprite pipe)
      Method to set isPassed to true
      Parameters:
      pipe - pipe that was passed

    • setNotPassed

      public void setNotPassed(Sprite pipe)
      Method to set isPassed to false
      Parameters:
      pipe - pipe that was not passed

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Method to set a sprite to be invisible if it should be
      Parameters:
      visible - If the sprite should be invisible
